net.livebookstore.web.core
Class AbstractBaseController

java.lang.Object
  net.livebookstore.web.core.AbstractBaseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractFormController, AbstractMvcController, AbstractRedirectController, AbstractScriptController, AbstractXmlController
public abstract class AbstractBaseController
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller

Super class used for init log and service objects. DONOT extends this class directly. Extends from AbstractMVCController, AbstractRedirectController, AbstractScriptController and AbstractXmlController.

Author:
xuefeng
